snippet: The explosion killed at least seven people and left 75 wounded and officials blamed the rebel group the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia for the attack.
abstract: Bomb explodes near a police station in Tumaco, Colombia, killing at least seven people and leaving 75 wounded; officials blame rebel group the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC, for the bombing.
lead_paragraph: The explosion killed at least seven people and left 75 wounded and officials blamed the rebel group the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia for the attack.
